Method Detail

parseInt

public static int parseInt(java.lang.String value)
                    throws java.text.ParseException
Converts string to int. In addition to handling 'normal' integers such 23452 it understands:
  • postfixes "m", "M", "mb", "MB" and "k", "kb", "K", "KB" e.g. 11m, 11.5mb, 11k.
  • commas e.g. 3,000 and 11,000,000

Throws:
java.text.ParseException

toString

public static java.lang.String toString(long[] array)
Convenience method for converting an array of longs into a string of numbers separated by commas.

Parameters:
array - longs to be converted to a string
Returns:
string of numbers separated by commas or an empty string if the array is null, empty.

toString

public static java.lang.String toString(long[] array,
                                        boolean ignoreZeroes)
Convenience method for converting an array of longs into a string of numbers separated by commas.

Parameters:
array - longs to be converted to a string
ignoreZeroes - whether zeros should be excluded from the string
Returns:
string of numbers separated by commas or an empty string if the array is null, empty or full of zeroes and ignoreZeroes=true.

indexOfFirstDigit

public static int indexOfFirstDigit(java.lang.String s)
Returns:
index of the first digit fround in the string, -1 if none found.

compare

public static final int compare(java.lang.String str1,
                                java.lang.String str2)
String comparison which handles null values. Basically the same as String.compare() except that "null" is a valid value which comes before ANY string and two "nulls" are equal.

sizeOrUnset

public static java.lang.String sizeOrUnset(java.util.Collection c)
Returns:
size as string or "null" if c==null.

stringOrUnset

public static java.lang.String stringOrUnset(java.lang.String s)
Returns:
s if not null else "unset".

setOrUnset

public static java.lang.String setOrUnset(java.lang.Object o)
Returns:
"set" if not null, "unset" if null.

briefOrUnset

public static java.lang.String briefOrUnset(java.lang.String s)
Converts s into a string representation of at most 10 characters or "unset" if s is null.

Returns:
unset of s==null, or first few chars followed by "...", e.g. briefOrUnset("aactctgaaattcg") = "aactctgaaa..."

capitaliseFirstLetter

public static java.lang.String capitaliseFirstLetter(java.lang.String s)
Capitalise first letter.

readTextFile

Read a text file into a String.
